text:
AngJobs | AngularJs developer | London | Remote

I am looking for a frontend developer to work on a modern job board software.

The project[0] has been started quite recently and it's a single page app built with AngularJS+WebApi(JSON endpoints)

There is also a position for a backend dev, that includes importing/parsing job feeds and providing JSON endpoints for the mobile apps as well.

contact me, Victor: hello@AngJobs.com

[0]https://github.com/victorantos/AngJobs
